amendment.description: An amendment numbered 55 printed in House Report 118-142 to exempt defense related activities from the Endangered Species Act.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to exempt defense-related activities from the Endangered Species Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A033) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 237 (Roll no. 322).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A033) offered by Mr. Biggs.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A033) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 237 (Roll no. 322).
